features: 【Clean Every Corner of Your Home with Ease】This wet spray mop is equipped with a 360° flexible rotating floor mop head with a thin flat design. You can easily control this hardwood floor mop to rotate flexibly around furniture and chair legs, and the thin flat design of the spray mop head is helpful to clean deep into the low space under the furniture. No more moving heavy furniture, easy to operate, this floor spray mop is great for cleaning all the hard-to-reach corners of your home.

【Large-capacity Refillable Water Tank】 Our microfiber spray mop set comes with a refillable water bottle, which can be added with any floor cleaning solution you want. And with a capacity of 550ml, it's enough to clean the floors in your home, no more frequent loading of cleaning liquid during mopping. Warm tips: A neutral cleaner is recommended. After each use, please add plain water to clean the bottle and nozzle, which is helpful to extend the life of floor mop with sprayer.

【Upgraded Nozzle for Fine Water Mist】 It is our aim to help our customers to clean their floors effectively while protecting floors. Considering too dry or too wet mops are not good for floor cleaning, we upgraded the nozzle of our wet spray mop for hardwood floors. This microfiber spray mop has a tiny nozzle that can effectively convert water into water mist. The water mist just slightly wet the floor, but will not soak the floor, then you can easily complete floor cleaning.

【Highly Absorbent Microfiber Mop Pads】 These reusable floor mop pads are made by premium microfiber materials, not only do they lock in hair and fine dust particles, but they also clean quickly and deeply for water stains on the floor. Cleaning your home with TRAV-ROUND highly absorbent spray mop pads, the floor will dry quickly. For families with children or pets, there is no need to worry about leaving dirty footprints or worrying about the safety of children after mopping.

【Zero Risk Purchase】 If you have any questions about our spray mop with washable pads, please feel free to contact us. All of our wet mops for floor cleaning undergo a rigorous quality inspection before leaving the factory, including a water spray test, to ensure that customers will receive a premium microfiber spray mop. Therefore, it is normal that there might be residual water in the bottle when you receive our spray mops for floor cleaning with washable pads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRAV-ROUND Professional Microfiber Spray Mop for Floor Cleaning with Reusable Washable Floor Mop Pads - Give You Back A Shiny Home Do you want a handy mop so that you can deal with messes quickly and at any time? Do you want the floor dries in minutes for the safe of babies and pets? Are you tired of carrying the heavy bucket around when mopping? Do you want to spend less time in house cleaning? If yes, TRAV-ROUND Professional Microfiber Spray Mop for hardwood floors is a good choice for you. TRAV-ROUND Professional mop for floor cleaning wet spray mop is lightweight, durable, and handy for daily use. The material of spray mop pole is allunium alloy, lightweight but strong enough. The hardwood floor mop comes with a 550ml water tank, fill the tank with your desired cleaning solution, just slightly press the trigger of spray mop, you will get a wide & fine water mist to clean the floor. Just take a few minutes, you can complete the previous tedious and tiring household cleaning. The fine water mist and high absorbent floor mop pads allow floor dries in minutes, won't soaking wood floors anymore and that is also very helpful for those with children or pets. The spray mops for floor cleaning with washable pads are suitable for all floor types, like laminate, hardwood, vinyl, tile, wood, glass, marble, bamboo, cement, stone and etc.

Refillable Water Bottle (19 oz) Convenient removable water bottle to refill with any cleaning solution you desired. No more being forced to buy a specific cleaning solution, you could choose a chemical-free floor cleaner, which is more safe for kids and pets. For daily floor cleaning, the combination of water and vinegar is a good choice. But we suggest that the water bottle of spray floor mop should be cleaned everytime after finished mopping. Flexible Rotating Spray Mop Head To offer a better cleaning experience, this TRAV-ROUND Microfiber Spray Mop is designed with a flexible rotating flat mop head. No stuck, 180° rotation front & rear, 180° rotation left & right. Therefore, you can easily control the dry wet spray mops for floor cleaning and effortlessly wipe up messes around the stairs, furniture and table legs flexibly. Handy Spray Trigger, Easy to Maneuver The spray trigger on the handle could be easily operated with one hand, just slight press the trigger, the nozzle will spritze a very fine mist in a V shape to give great coverage on the floor. No need to drag a heavy bucket anymore, choosing TRAV-ROUND wet mops for floor cleaning with refillable bottle, you can easily clean your floors with less time and effort.

To protect your floors better, this TRAV-ROUND wet mops for floor cleaning adopt the tiny spray nozzle, which perfectly turns water into fine water mist. The water mist of our wood floor mop is wet enough to clean up spots and dust, but not so wet that it streaks or leaves puddles on the floor. No need to worry soaking your wood floor anymore. Warm Tips: * Please do not add boiling water, strong acid, alkali detergent into the bottle of the floor cleaner mop. * When the floor spray mop isn't in use, it is not recommended to store liquid in the bottle, prevent corrosion of spray system. * All of our spray mops for floor cleaning will be added water to test the spray function before leaving the factory, so it is normal that there might be a little water in the bottle when you receive our spray mop. * It would be better to clean the water bottle and spray nozzle of wet spray mop evertime after mopping.

TRAV-ROUND High Absorbent Microfiber Reusable Floor Mop Pads The TRAV-ROUND floor mop pads have millions of microscopic fibers, which are super absorbent and can effectively grab dirt, dust, and hair. The microfiber spray mop pads absorb water quickly, no soaking wood floors, floor dries in minutes, you can quickly walk on floors, especially helpful for those with children or pets. Easy to change and clean the microfiber spray mop pads. When finished mopping, remove the dirty floor mop head from the panel of spray floor mop, just throw them in the washing machine and let them air dry for next cleaning. This spray mop set includes three microfiber mop pads, which are reusable and durable. You can reuse them up to 100x times, no need to purchase disposable cloth anymore, save your money & energy.

The microfiber spray mop set include: 1 * Ergonomic spray mop handle; 1 * Aluminum alloy middle pole; 1 * Aluminum alloy lower pole; 1 * Spray mop head; 3 * Reusable microfiber floor mop pads; 1 * 550ml Refillable bottle; 1 * Practical Scraper. Assembling the microfiber spray mop for laminate floors is easy and fast. Below is the installation steps: 1. Insert the pole till the white button pops up 2. Connect the floor mop head 3. Add cleaning solution into the water bottle of spray mop, and then insert it tightly 4. Press and stick the floor mop pad on the panel of spray mop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product. It get the job done quite well. Easy to work with and it comes with 2 extra pads. The cleaning solution is not included though. Overall, great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mop!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these mops about 2 years ago and it started leaking but I couldn't fix it so bought another one because it is so handy. I love that you can use your own cleaning fluid and the mop heads are machine washable. It is not recommended to use thick floor cleaners as I am sure that would clog up the sprayer, but any other liquid cleaner will work. Such a time saver and no batteries to replace as well. Saves cost! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great until the sprayer stops working
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in Noverber and now January the sprayer pump stopped working. So I had to buy another one, as it is the only design, it works great when sprayer is working my house is 1550 sq ft and all simulated wood floor so this very handy.I just hope this one lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I used to have the swiffer mop for years but after buying a new one for the third time, because the sprayer stopped working, I got a Libman on sale. But had to buy the pad. Liked that I wasted less money on pads and buying the cleaning solution. But that stopped working after 2 or 3 years. Now I got this blue mop. Got it a couple of month now. Love that it comes with 5 microfiber pads. So I can wash one and still be able to use the next. The dark blue is perfect, the pads are thick, well made. I was worried, using microfiber pads that they dont clean proper, that they would smear. But not at all. Nice and clean moping. See the video. I use Pine disinfectant cleaner. Just a little mixed with with lots of water does the magic. When I want to be picky, I would tell the company, to design the bottle so it stand on its own. That would be a nice touch. Other then that; so far so good, I love this mop, it works great. For the money it's a great deal. I hope it will last me a very long time, but even when it would die in a year, I would buy it again, and give it another try. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this vacuum cleaner often; easy to use and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BETTER THAN SWIFFER
reviews.reviewText: I was happy to discover this product! I have an Air BNB beach condo with luxury vinyl plank flooring. The manufacturer recommended routine cleaning of the floor with dish soap and warm water. Not wanting to have to use a mop and bucket to comply with the cleaning instructions, we used a Swiffer. But with frequent rentals, we were tearing through lots of the cleaning solution and the pads. This unit allows you to create your own cleaning solution, or to use whatever flooring cleaner you like, and comes with 5 pads that can be washed in the laundry, and they capture everything from hair, to dust, to dirt and sand. The unit is simple to assemble and use and has great maneuverability under and around furniture. We use this on the LVP as well as our bathroom tile. It is a much more cost-effective alternative to the Swiffer products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mop works well until the water dispenser won’t work sometimes
reviews.reviewText: This mop worked well for the first month that I had it and everyone in our house loved it. I loved it. It’s easy to wash the pads in the machine and so much more economical and environmentally friendly than throw away swifter pads (which I’m not convinced really get your floor clean anyway)I also love that you can use your own natural floor cleaner with this (I use vinegar and water)However after about a month the mop started having issues spraying water. It works sometimes and sometimes I have to mash the button a bunch of times to spray. I just dump some water vinegar on the floor to mop most days.It still works for that purpose so I didn’t return it as it was so reasonably priced I didn’t think it was that big of a deal. If this bothers you you may want to get a more expensive option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy but works
reviews.reviewText: It’s a bit flimsy but does the job. I do wish the spray nozzle was located maybe a little lower because it has a good spray but tends to spray at my furniture as well if I don’t hold it at an angle. What I do like and appreciate about this product is that it comes with extra pads so I can easily replace and wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Really pleased, works well and good value.
reviews.reviewText: Came well packaged and with instructions to assemble which was easy to follow.Does a really good job of the cleaning and comes with 5 cleaning mats, fairly easy to use and fairly lightweight.Overall very pleased with the purchase and good value at the price paid whilst on offer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many mops but this one beats them all. Easy to use,easy to fill and with reusable pads no landfill. Great price also. Quality and quickness of use Great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So much easier to use than the old bucket and mop. Works well on tiles, hardwood and vinyl. plenty of spare cleaning pads. Seems a tad flimsy but ideal for my smallish house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mop. It’s easy to use, lightweight & non messy, gets into the tightest corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
